trans-unit.source: Aura Blast
trans-unit.target: 灵气冲击波

trans-unit.resname: PLS·1 | Aura Blast | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target enchantment.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "None of your history books mention me?" laughed Daria. "They will now."
trans-unit.target: 「你们的历史课本都没提过我吗？」达莉亚笑道：「现在它们会提了吧。」

trans-unit.source: Aurora Griffin
trans-unit.target: 曙光狮鹫

trans-unit.resname: PLS·2 | Aurora Griffin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\no\nW: Target permanent becomes white until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 oW：目标永久物成为白色直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Though a fierce fighter, its true value is that it inspires beleaguered forces.
trans-unit.target: 它的确凶猛善战，但最可贵的是它带给受围困军队激昂的士气。

trans-unit.resname: PLS·3 | Disciple of Kangee | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disciple of Kangee
trans-unit.target: 坎鴶的门徒

trans-unit.resname: PLS·3 | Disciple of Kangee | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nU, oc\nT: Target creature gains flying and becomes blue until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: oU，ocT：目标生物获得飞行异能，并成为蓝色，直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PLS·3 | Disciple of Kangee | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When no birds are available, Kangee's disciples fill the sky with anything that's willing to fight.
trans-unit.target: 当没有鸟可使唤时，坎鴶的门徒便将任何愿意战斗的东西送上天空。

trans-unit.source: Dominaria's Judgment
trans-unit.target: 多明纳里亚大审判

trans-unit.resname: PLS·4 | Dominaria's Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain protection from white if you control a plains, from blue if you control an island, from black if you control a swamp, from red if you control a mountain, and from green if you control a forest.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得以下反色保护异能：若你操控平原则反白；若你操控海岛则反蓝；若你操控沼泽则反黑；若你操控山脉则反红；若你操控树林则反绿。

trans-unit.source: Guard Dogs
trans-unit.target: 警卫狗

trans-unit.resname: PLS·5 | Guard Dogs | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2o\nW, oc\nT: Choose a permanent you control. Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn if it shares a color with that permanent.
trans-unit.target: o2oW，ocT：选择一个由你操控的永久物。若目标生物与此永久物有共通的颜色，则于本回合中，防止它将造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: "A good guard is alert. A great guard is also loyal."\n—Benalish kennelmaster
trans-unit.target: 「高明的警卫为你时时留神，优秀的警卫则还要对你忠诚。」 ～宾纳里亚的育犬家

trans-unit.source: Heroic Defiance
trans-unit.target: 英勇挑战

trans-unit.resname: PLS·6 | Heroic Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 unless it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.
trans-unit.target: 若所有永久物之间最普遍的颜色或同为最普遍的数个颜色中，和受此结界的生物没有共通的颜色，则它得+3/+3。

trans-unit.source: "Wear courage as your armor. Wield honor as your blade."\n—Gerrard
trans-unit.target: 「将勇气如甲胄般穿戴，将荣誉如刀剑般挥舞。」 ～杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Hobble
trans-unit.target: 蹒跚

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature can't attack.\nEnchanted creature can't block if it's black.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。 受此结界的生物不能进行攻击。 受此结界的生物若为黑色，则不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Honorable Scout
trans-unit.target: 可敬的斥侯

trans-unit.resname: PLS·8 | Honorable Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you gain 2 life for each black and/or red creature target opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，目标对手每操控一个黑色和／或红色生物，你便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I've faced your kind before. This time I'm ready for you."
trans-unit.target: 「我与你那边的人打过交道。这次我可是有备而来。」

trans-unit.source: Lashknife Barrier
trans-unit.target: 锁链刀舞

trans-unit.resname: PLS·9 | Lashknife Barrier | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.\nIf a source would deal damage to a creature you control, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。 若任一来源将对一个由你操控的生物造成伤害，则改为该来源对该生物造成原数量减1的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PLS·10 | March of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: March of Souls
trans-unit.target: 众魂行进

trans-unit.resname: PLS·10 | March of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。每有一个生物因此被消灭，其操控者便将一个1/1白色，具有飞行异能的精魂衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Orim's Chant
trans-unit.target: 欧琳的吟颂

trans-unit.source:
Kicker o
W (You may pay an additional o
W as you play this spell.)
Target player can't play spells this turn.
If you paid the kicker cost, creatures can't attack this turn.
trans-unit.target: 增幅oW（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付oW） 目标牌手本回合不能使用咒语。 若你已支付其增幅费用，则本回合生物亦不能攻击。

trans-unit.source: Planeswalker's Mirth
trans-unit.target: 旅法师的欢颜

trans-unit.resname: PLS·12 | Planeswalker's Mirth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o3o\nW: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: o3oW：目标对手从手上随机展示一张牌。你获得与该牌之总法术力费用等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "I enjoy a good joke as much as the next guy."\n—Commodore Guff
trans-unit.target: 「我和普通人一样喜欢好笑话。」 ～古夫准将

trans-unit.source: Pollen Remedy
trans-unit.target: 花粉疗法

trans-unit.resname: PLS·13 | Pollen Remedy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker—\nSacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)\nPrevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose. If you paid the kicker cost, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.
trans-unit.target: 增幅～牺牲一张地（你使用此咒语时可以额外牺牲一张地）。 于本回合中，为任意数量的目标生物和／或牌手防止接下来的3点伤害，你可以任意分配。若你已支付其增幅费用，则改为以此法防止接下来的6点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Samite Elder
trans-unit.target: 撒姆尼长老

trans-unit.resname: PLS·14 | Samite Elder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Creatures you control gain protection from the color(s) of target permanent you control until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得反色保护异能，该些颜色为目标由你操控之永久物所具有的颜色。

trans-unit.resname: PLS·15 | Samite Pilgrim | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
trans-unit.target: ocT：于本回合中，为目标生物防止接下来的X点伤害；X为在由你操控的地之中，基本地类别的数量。

trans-unit.source: Sunscape Battlemage

trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.source: Sunscape Familiar

trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击） 你所使用的绿色和蓝色咒语减少o1即可使用。

trans-unit.source: The spirits of fallen battlemages can serve their guilds as familiars by joining with any physical form.
trans-unit.target: 战巫师死后的灵魂，能依附在各种形体上成为佣兽，继续为公会效力。

trans-unit.source: Surprise Deployment
trans-unit.target: 奇兵

trans-unit.resname: PLS·18 | Surprise Deployment | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only during combat.\nPut a nonwhite creature card from your hand into play. At end of turn, return that creature to your hand. (Return it only if it's in play.)
trans-unit.target: 你只能于战斗中使用CARDNAME。 将一张非白色的生物牌从你手上放置进场。在回合结束时，将该生物移回你的手上。（若它在场上，你才须将之移回）

trans-unit.resname: PLS·19 | Voice of All | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Voice of All
trans-unit.target: 万物使者

trans-unit.resname: PLS·19 | Voice of All | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAs CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color.\nCARDNAME has protection from the chosen color.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色。 CARDNAME具有该色的反色保护异能。

trans-unit.source: Allied Strategies
trans-unit.target: 结盟策略

trans-unit.resname: PLS·20 | Allied Strategies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 在目标牌手所操控的地之中，每有一种基本地类别，他便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.
trans-unit.target: 指挥官们面面相觑，等著看谁会带头背弃盟约。

trans-unit.source: Arctic Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 极地人鱼

trans-unit.resname: PLS·21 | Arctic Merfolk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker—\nReturn a creature you control to its owner's hand. (You may return a creature you control to its owner's hand in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)\nIf you paid the kicker cost, CARDNAME comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 增幅～将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上（你使用此咒语时可以额外将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上）。 若你已支付其增幅费用，则CARDNAME进场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Confound
trans-unit.target: 混淆

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标指定一个或更多生物为目标的咒语。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Did I know Szat would betray us?" Urza asked quizzically. "I was counting on it."
trans-unit.target: 「你问我之前我知不知道刹特会背叛我们？」克撒似笑非笑地说：「我还指望著呢。」

trans-unit.source: Dralnu's Pet
trans-unit.target: 卓尔努的宠物

trans-unit.resname: PLS·23 | Dralnu's Pet | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Kicker—o2o
B, Discard a creature card from your hand. (You may pay o2o
B and discard a creature card from your hand in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)
If you paid the kicker cost, CARDNAME has flying and comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 增幅～o2oB，从你手上弃掉一张生物牌（你使用此咒语时可以额外支付o2oB并从你手上弃掉一张生物牌）。 若你已支付其增幅费用，则CARDNAME具有飞行异能，并且进场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所弃掉之牌的总法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Ertai's Trickery
trans-unit.target: 尔泰的诡计

trans-unit.resname: PLS·24 | Ertai's Trickery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell if a kicker cost was paid for it.
trans-unit.target: 若有增幅费用为目标咒语而支付，则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, Gerrard," said Ertai. "I'm sure the crew will come to your rescue as quickly as they came to mine."
trans-unit.target: 「杰拉尔德，别担心，」尔泰说：「我相信他们赶来救你的速度会和之前来救我的一样快。」

trans-unit.source: Escape Routes
trans-unit.target: 逃脱路线

trans-unit.resname: PLS·25 | Escape Routes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2o\nU: Return target white or black creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: o2oU：将目标由你操控的白色或黑色生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "I'll get you to safety—or whatever passes for safety these days."\n—Urborg ferry pilot
trans-unit.target: 「我会带你脱离险境…或是带你到暂时还不算太危险的地带。」 ～乌尔博格摆渡舵手

trans-unit.source: Gainsay
trans-unit.target: 驳斥

trans-unit.source: Counter target blue spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标蓝色咒语。

trans-unit.source: "I'd be happy to stop contradicting you, Urza, just as soon as you start being right."\n—Bo Levar, planeswalker
trans-unit.target: 「只要你是对的，我马上就停止对你的反驳，克撒。」 ～旅法师波·里瓦

trans-unit.source: Hunting Drake
trans-unit.target: 行猎龙兽

trans-unit.resname: PLS·27 | Hunting Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, put target red or green creature on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标红色或绿色生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶上。

trans-unit.source: Even the fiercest beast will flee when faced with the possibility of becoming dinner.
trans-unit.target: 就算是最凶猛的野兽，在面对可能变成晚餐的状况时都会逃开。

trans-unit.source: Planar Overlay
trans-unit.target: 时空覆盖

trans-unit.resname: PLS·28 | Planar Overlay | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a land he or she controls of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手在他所操控的地之中，对每一种基本地类别各选择一张。将这些地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: The Phyrexians don't want to conquer Dominaria. They want to remake it.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚人并非要占领多明纳里亚。他们是想重做一个。

trans-unit.source: Planeswalker's Mischief
trans-unit.target: 旅法师的恶作剧

trans-unit.resname: PLS·29 | Planeswalker's Mischief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o3o\nU: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. If it's an instant or sorcery card, remove it from the game. As long as it remains removed from the game, you may play it as though it were in your hand without paying its mana cost. If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0. At end of turn, if you haven't played it, return it to its owner's hand. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: o3oU：目标对手从手上随机展示一张牌。若该牌是法术或瞬间牌，则将之移出对战。只要该牌保持在被移出对战的状态，你便可将它视为在你手上一般地使用，且不须支付其法术力费用。若该牌之法术力费用中含有X，则X为0。在回合结束时，若你仍未使用该牌，则将之移回其拥有者手上。你只可以于你能够使用法术的时机下使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: Rushing River
trans-unit.target: 湍流

trans-unit.resname: PLS·30 | Rushing River | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker—\nSacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)\nReturn target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you paid the kicker cost, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 增幅～牺牲一张地（你使用此咒语时可以额外牺牲一张地）。 将目标非地的永久物移回其拥有者手上。若你已支付其增幅费用，则再将另一个目标非地的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Sea Snidd
trans-unit.target: 海生史尼兽

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Target land's type becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：选择一种基本地类别，目标地成为该类别的地直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: It always has the home-turf advantage.
trans-unit.target: 它无论何时都能占有地利。

trans-unit.source: Shifting Sky
trans-unit.target: 变幻长空

trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色。 所有非地的永久物成为该色。

trans-unit.source: Master the sky and you rule everything beneath it.\n—Metathran saying
trans-unit.target: 掌握天空，即能掌握其下的一切。 ～仿索蓝人铭言

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature has "o2o\nU: Target creature becomes the color of your choice until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。 受此结界的生物具有「o2oU：选择一个颜色，目标生物成为该色直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.source: Sleeping Potion
trans-unit.target: 催眠剂

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.\nWhen enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，横置受此结界的生物。 受此结界的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。 当受此结界的生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.target: 岚景院的学徒在升格为大师以前，都必须亲手养育一只猫头鹰。

trans-unit.source: Sunken Hope

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手将一个由他操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: While Dominarians fought for their world, Rath stole it from under their feet.
trans-unit.target: 多明纳里亚人为他们的世界奋斗著，而瑞斯人则由他们的脚下偷盗走。

U (You may pay an additional o
U as you play this spell.)
